mapper.insert: insert into smember(sMemberId, sName, sPwd, sTel, pr, zipcode, address1, address2, identification, accountCopy) values(#{sMemberId}, #{sName}, #{sPwd}, #{sTel}, #{pr}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{identification}, #{accountCopy})
mapper.select: select sPwd from smember where sMemberId=#{sMemberId}
select sName from sMember where sMemberId=#{sMemberId}
select count(*) from smember where smemberid=#{sMemberId}
